input_args.passage: 'Yōko Shōji - Wikipedia | Yōko Shōji (庄司 陽子, Shōji Yōko, born 4 June 1950, in Mobara, Chiba) is a Japanese manga artist. She is best known for writing Seito Shokun! (Attention Students!), for which she won the Kodansha Manga Award for shōjo in 1978., Seito Shokun!, (Attention Students!)'
